tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Weights (layer_id INT, weight DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE Biases (layer_id INT, bias DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE Layers (layer_id INT, activation_function VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE NeuralNetworks (network_id INT, network_name VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE Updates (update_id INT, layer_id INT, new_weight DECIMAL, new_bias DECIMAL);
